meanings.definition: A period of time equal to a twenty-fourth part of a day and night and divided into 60 minutes.
meanings.sent1: She spent many hours studying for her exam.
meanings.sent2: The store is open for several hours in the afternoon.
meanings.sent3: It took hours for the cake to bake in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The hours passed slowly as they waited for the train.
meanings.sent5: The hours of daylight grew shorter as winter approached.

meanings.definition: The time of day as indicated by a clock.
meanings.sent1: He always wakes up at the same hours every morning.
meanings.sent2: The meeting is scheduled for the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent3: The clock struck the hours as the old town hall chimed.
meanings.sent4: The hours on the clock seemed to move faster during the busy workday.
meanings.sent5: The hours on the clock face glowed in the dimly lit room.
